name: Chef & Friends: Recipe for Success
storyline: The greedy billionaire Ethan Shark wants to get rid of all chefs and replace them with soulless robots. His Fast Food Empire is buying up and destroying restaurants and cafes all over the globe. If a restaurant owner refuses to sell their property, Ethan pits the Tasty Hills food critic against them. Chef, only you can save the world of real cooking!
summary: Gather a team of professional restorers and protect restaurants and cafes from Ethan's greed. Help aspiring chefs pass the assessment of the Culinary Bulletin's restaurant critic: upgrade kitchens, renovate interiors, and give owners a makeover. Chef, hurry now to discover unforgettable culinary adventures! Play Chef & Friends!
